    Common interface for standardizing the markup of a PE structure.

    • Method Detail

      • markup

        void markup​(Program program,
            boolean isBinary,
            TaskMonitor monitor,
            MessageLog log,
            NTHeader ntHeader)
     throws DuplicateNameException,
            CodeUnitInsertionException,
            java.io.IOException,
            MemoryAccessException
        Marks up a PE structure.
        Parameters:
        program - The program to markup.
        isBinary - True if the program is binary; otherwise, false.
        monitor - The monitor.
        log - The log.
        ntHeader - The PE's NT Header structure.
        Throws:
        DuplicateNameException
        CodeUnitInsertionException
        java.io.IOException
        MemoryAccessException
